commit.message:
Add getNumber() to JSON types

Signed-off-by: Paulo Lopes <pmlopes@gmail.com>

nodes.bodyText: Integer should be replaced by Number in the javadoc

commit.message:
Fix copy paste bug on javadoc

Signed-off-by: Paulo Lopes <pmlopes@gmail.com>

nodes.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
               * Get the Integer at position {@code pos} in the array,
          
          
            
               * Get the Number at position {@code pos} in the array,

Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
               * @throws java.lang.ClassCastException if the value cannot be converted to Number
          
          
            
               * @throws java.lang.ClassCastException if the value is not a Number
          
      
    
    
  

There is no conversion, only casting.

Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
               * @throws java.lang.ClassCastException if the value is not an Number
          
          
            
               * @throws java.lang.ClassCastException if the value is not a Number

commit.message:
Add fixes to javadoc + test for new added method

Signed-off-by: Paulo Lopes <pmlopes@gmail.com>
